-e ---

𒅴 Zunge 𒅗 ZU₂ 𒅴 EME 𒈨 ME/•NGE 𓊃 𓈖 𓎡 𓄓 tongue •Zinke

𒅴 ≈ 𒈨·𒅗 ME.KA мацӏ macʼ мез mez миц mic мицӏцӏи mihi mēle "tongue" NE Caucasian & Basque
𒅴 ≈ 𒈨·𒅗 ME.KA ≈ •neǧa 𓈖 𓄓 𓋴 𓄻 … shā 舌
𒅴 ≈ 𒅗·𒈨 KA.ME ⇔ Kieme келн kielien k̓a̱la̱m 舌嫲 sa̍t-mà
𒅴 ≈ 𒀸𒋰𒁹𒈨̲𒁹̲ ᵠEME "mouth"
𒅴 ≈ 𓄓 "tongue" longue, language, lingua, lisan לָשׁוֹן lashón ልሳን لسان лезми lezmi! ⇔ мез γλῶσσα glôssa
𒅴 ≈ 𓂋 𓏤 रसना rasnā > 𐎍𐎌𐎐 lisan ⇔ 𒊕 raš riš راس rās 𐤓𐤀𐤔 𒅗 raš רֹאשׁ rósh 𓁷 𓁶
𒅴 ≈ 𓂋 𓏤 ≈ mouth 𓌃 мотт mott mot

𒅴 ᴷEME 𓆎 𓏏 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 Common copt Κοινή

𒅴 ˢEME in زمان ziman 𒅴𒄀 𒅴𒂠 ˢemeĝir Sumerian
𒅴𒄀 ˢemengi сма́га smága •zemengir צימאון zimaon szomj ጥም ṭəmᶥⁿᵍ #šurpītu thirst
𒅴𒄀 𒅴𒂠 ˢeme-ĝir₁₅ ˢemeĝir Sumerian #šumeritum šumerû

𒅴 ʳEME 𓂋 𓏤 Reime ⇔ name

𒅴 lezu լեզու las ⲗⲁⲥ lisan in 𒅴 𒋃 liz.rit lizard 𓆈

languages & dialects

𒅴𒄀 eme-giᵖ Sumerian
𒅴𒂠 eme-ĝir Sumerian ⇔
𒅴𒃲 eme-gal = lisanu rabu, 'great speech' ( 𓄓 ≈ 𓆈 )
𒅴𒄞 eme-gud = lisanu elu, 'lofty speech'; ⇔ gut Goth Getian …

𒅴𒋤 eme-mus = lisan zimi, 'speech of adornment'; ⇔ 𓆓 𓂧 𓆑 @ Mizraim 𓆎 𓅓 𓏏 𓊖
𒅴𒋛𒁲 eme-si-di = lisan mesari, 'correct speech'; ⇔ math maat ^^ 𓁦 𓋬 𓐒 𓄟 𓊖

𒅴𒋼x eme-TE-NAD we have not the slightest basis for conjecture ;)

𒅴𒍠𒂵𒁇𒁇 eme-zag-ga-bar-bar emezagabarbar mace driveling

𒅴𒃻 KA×ME+GAR ≈ 𒂊𒈨𒃻 e-me-ĝar emeĝarₓ "Magier"
𒅶 KA× ME+GI "magic" ≈ emeĝarₓ |KA×(ME.GAR)| 𒅗 ⇔ Hexer ?

𒅗+𒈨 DUG+ME mouth 𒅴 tongue Zunge 𒈨mg/gm

𓆓𓂧 Dice 𒅗 DUG talk tongue ⇔ song = 𒊕 saĝ sagen

𒅴𒁄 /targuman/ translator תֻּרְגְּמָן turg'mán ت ر ج م ᵇt-r-ʒ-m
